name: Provident Security Corp.
address: Provident Security Corp., 2309 W 41st Ave, Vancouver, BC V6M 2A3

featured_reviews.review_id: Provident Security has been awesome in providing quick service to our team. They support all of our locations and always go the extra mile to ensure that all of our information is kept confidential. They are available 24/7 and have fixed ANY issue that arises. If you never want to worry about the security of your home or business again, use Provident. We couldn't imagine using another company - they are superb!
featured_reviews.review_text: Provident Security has been awesome in providing quick service to our team. They support all of our locations and always go the extra mile to ensure that all of our information is kept confidential. They are available 24/7 and have fixed ANY issue that arises. If you never want to worry about the security of your home or business again, use Provident. We couldn't imagine using another company - they are superb!

featured_reviews.review_id: I have personally used the services of Provident Security since 1998. As a  local Westside Realtor, I also have no hesitation to refer their services out to my Clients as I know they will be taken care of. They are an amazing company.  Customer service is phenomenal.  The guaranteed response time has come into play a few times over the years and I have always been taken care of quickly and efficiently.  Great personal service and follow up.  Professional staff.  I highly recommend Provident Security. I wouldn't choose any other company.

featured_reviews.review_id: Being a long tenured customer of this company means nothing - their accounting team's mistakes/deficiencies are blamed on customers and even though services are paid for in full - they refuse to fulfill their services. Horrible customer service - was not always like this...not sure what happened to this company. All our neighbours have moved onto other security providers and I can see why.
featured_reviews.review_text: Being a long tenured customer of this company means nothing - their accounting team's mistakes/deficiencies are blamed on customers and even though services are paid for in full - they refuse to fulfill their services. Horrible customer service - was not always like this...not sure what happened to this company. All our neighbours have moved onto other security providers and I can see why.

featured_reviews.review_id: I've been a Provident client since 2006 and have had them look after three homes. Most recently we worked with Chrissie on the sales team who coordinated an installation in our new home. Reza & John were the Technicians who did a great job getting everything installed and set up. We've also made great use of the concierge service, including getting last minute deliveries to both our home and even the beach.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Provident Security is amazing.

Having had such a great experience with them in Vancouver (at our home and 2 business locations), it made sense to have them take care of our Whistler place.

I am amazed by how much convenience and piece of mind they have given me.

Provident has called us when our water sensors went off.  I know that we dodged a huge bullet (a friend didn't know about a slow leaking pipe in their place and it cost them over $100,000 and almost a year in renovations).

Provident has also let me into my own place (when I left my keys in Vancouver).  This saved my family and I over 4 hours of travelling time.

Provident - you rock

featured_reviews.review_id: Provident put the best possible spin on our recent break-in.  With the alarm ringing, the thief was in and out in 2 minutes and Provident arrived 1 minute later (i.e., in 3 minutes!) They definitely saved us from a robbery of much greater magnitude. Provident personnel could not have done a better job  - from providing accurate and reassuring details in the initial phone call to us, to greeting us with empathy when we arrived at the house, boarding up the broken window and even cleaning up mud and glass from the interior of the house.  They walked us through what had happened and gave us tips to prevent further break-ins. These two Provident employees really helped offset our distress at being broken into and definitely exemplified the high standards advertised at Provident.  We cannot recommend them more highly.

featured_reviews.review_id: I couldn't be more impressed with Provident.  5 mins or less is unbelievable, the staff is well trained and incredibly professional, they are on a serious mission to get the job done quickly, efficiently, with quality and safety as top priorities.  I even had the opportunity to get a behind the scenes tour of the business from the founder, and I could not believe how well it is run.  Their business systems & processes are very well thought out to handle every scenario imaginable with precision.  I'm a huge fan!

featured_reviews.review_id: Provident Security has provided security surveillance for our house in Vancouver since 2008. Their service including installation, maintenance and continuous monitoring has always been personable, prompt, courteous and thorough. We highly recommend them.
